en.name: Compound Bow
en.passiveDescription: Normal Attack and Charged Attack hits increase ATK by {{4//5//6//7//8%}} and Normal ATK SPD by {{1.2//1.5//1.8//2.1//2.4%}} for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

zh.name: 钢轮弓
zh.passiveDescription: 普通攻击与重击命中时，提升{{4//5//6//7//8%}}攻击力与{{1.2//1.5//1.8//2.1//2.4%}}普通攻击速度。该效果持续6秒，最多可以叠加4层，每0.3秒只能触发一次。
